word: THESE PHYSICAL CONDITIONS CORRESPOND TO THE EXPERIENCES OF THE PROPHET DANIEL WHILE IN VISION, AS HE RECORDS THEM IN THE TENTH CHAPTER OF HIS PROPHECY. HE REFERS TO A LOSS OF STRENGTH, AND THE APPEARANCE OF AN ANGEL WHO IMPARTED SUPERNATURAL STRENGTH. "AS FOR ME," HE DECLARES, "STRAIGHTWAY THERE REMAINED NO STRENGTH IN ME, NEITHER IS THERE BREATH LEFT IN ME. THEN THERE CAME AGAIN AND TOUCHED ME ONE LIKE THE APPEARANCE OF A MAN, AND HE STRENGTHENED ME." DANIEL 10:17, 18.
